ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate
1 (3 ounce) package lime flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This is a quick and easy refreshing pie. It may be served either chilled or frozen! Graham cracker pie crust can be used instead of a baked pie crust."
ins:
Heat the lemonade and the water to boiling. Add the gelatin and the cream cheese and blend well.
Fold in the non-dairy whipped topping.
Pour mixture into the pie shell and chill or freeze. It's a breeze!
